backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining a 30‑day program, user profiles, and progress APIs with authorization checks and map‑based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of many frontend file paths to short human‑written summaries for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with global CSS variable definitions.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup defining all main routes and wrapping content in ThemeProvider and AppShell.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query‑cache clearing and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/exercise/Exercis: Component that displays exercise video or image with error handling and fallback UI.
React layout component providing navigation, mobile drawer, user greeting, and identity‑aware UI structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Implements a countdown timer hook with start, pause, reset, and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for program data, progress, days, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkoutActions.ts: Mutation hooks for marking days complete, resetting progress, and saving user profiles with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and fitness‑themed design tokens for light/dark mode with gradient utilities.
frontend/src/lib/programContent.ts: Defines workout program structure and media mapping for daily exercises with detailed program data.
frontend/src/lib/progressMath.ts: Utility functions to compute next incomplete day, streak length, and completion percentage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user fitness dashboard with authentication checks, progress data, and a sign‑in prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/DayDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed workout info for a specific day, including exercises, completion state, and navigation back to the program.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Presents an introductory overview of the 30‑day program and instructions on how to use the app.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramPage.tsx: Renders the full 30‑day schedule grouped by weeks, showing completion status and enabling navigation to each day.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutRunnerPage.tsx: Provides an interactive workout runner with exercise progress tracking, timers, and completion handling for a given day.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, issues, and architectural notes for a 30‑day fitness app.
